CSS styles

Desktop

Links
a {
    color: #4569A0;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: normal;
    text-decoration: underline;
}
Current page
.current-page {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: normal;
    text-decoration: none;
}
Divider
.divider {
    color: #9C9C9C;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: normal;
}

Link
a {

    line-height: normal;
    text-decoration: underline;
}

    color: #4569A0;
    height: 16px;
    width: 16px;
}
